title: Update Machine Payload: PUT /api/machine/<asset_id>
description: Definition of the payload for creating machine API request: PUT /api/machine/<asset_id>

customerId.description: Defines the user who added the production data.

machineDesc.description: Defines short description for the machine.

manufacturerId.description: Defines the manufacturer that produced the machine.

balance.description: Defines the amount of money deposited in the machine's account.
